# ScaleHub

ScaleHub provides document processing combining AI automation with a global network of human contributors for high-volume document extraction.

![ScaleHub](./assets/scalehub.png)

## Overview

ScaleHub operates a hybrid processing model that combines AI automation with a 24/7 global network of human contributors to process documents at scale. The company targets organizations with high-volume document processing requirements, offering rapid deployment timelines and processing turnaround under one hour for any volume. Operating as ScaleHub AG, the platform provides cloud-based processing with accuracy rates guaranteed above 99% through the combination of automated extraction and human verification.

## Key Features

- **Hybrid Processing**: Combines AI [extraction](../../capabilities/extraction/index.md) with human contributor verification for accuracy
- **24/7 Global Network**: Round-the-clock processing capacity through distributed contributor base
- **Rapid Deployment**: Implementation in days rather than weeks or months
- **Volume Scalability**: Handles variable document volumes without capacity constraints
- **Accuracy Guarantee**: Processing accuracy above 99% through hybrid verification approach

## Technical Specifications

| Feature | Specification |
|---------|---------------|
| Processing Model | Hybrid AI and human contributor network |
| Deployment | Cloud-based |
| Turnaround Time | Under one hour for any volume |
| Accuracy | >99% guaranteed |
| Implementation Timeline | Days to deployment |
| Availability | 24/7 processing |
